name: CMSampleBuffer.Error
desc: A structure that defines errors that occur during framework operations.

items.name: static let allocationFailed: NSError
items.desc: The system failed to allocate memory.

items.name: static let alreadyHasDataBuffer: NSError
items.desc: You attempted to set data on a sample buffer that already contains media data.

items.name: static let arrayTooSmall: NSError
items.desc: The output array isn’t large enough to hold the requested array.

items.name: static let bufferHasNoSampleSizes: NSError
items.desc: You requested sample sizes on a buffer that doesn’t provide that information.

items.name: static let bufferHasNoSampleTimingInfo: NSError
items.desc: You requested sample timing on a buffer that doesn’t contain that information.

items.name: static let bufferNotReady: NSError
items.desc: The system can’t make the buffer’s data ready for use.

items.name: static let cannotSubdivide: NSError
items.desc: A sample buffer doesn’t contain sample sizes.

items.name: static let dataCanceled: NSError
items.desc: A sample buffer canceled its data loading operation.

items.name: static let dataFailed: NSError
items.desc: A sample buffer failed to load its data.

items.name: static let invalidEntryCount: NSError
items.desc: A timing or size value isn’t within the allowed range.

items.name: static let invalidMediaFormat: NSError
items.desc: The format of the media doesn’t match the sample buffer’s format description.

items.name: static let invalidMediaTypeForOperation: NSError
items.desc: The media type the format description defines isn’t value for the requested operation.

items.name: static let invalidSampleData: NSError
items.desc: The sample buffer contains bad data.

items.name: static let invalidated: NSError
items.desc: A sample buffer invalidated its data.

items.name: static let requiredParameterMissing: NSError
items.desc: You didn’t provide a valid value for a required parameter.

items.name: static let sampleIndexOutOfRange: NSError
items.desc: You specified a sample index that’s outside of the range of samples that the buffer contains.

items.name: static let sampleTimingInfoInvalid: NSError
items.desc: The sample buffer unexpectedly contains nonnumeric sample timing information.
